column1: Little Goat Diner////If you're trying to be the touristy Chicago visitor
column2: you have to stop by Little Goat and try their nachos. Hands down
column3: best in the city. As a heads up
column5: you won't finish them. Also try the bullseye French toast. I personally wasn't a big fan of it
column6: but the rest of my table thought it was fantastic.
